name: Connoils By Kraft - Bulk Organic Plant Sterol Oil & Powder
description: Connoils By Kraft is a leading international supplement manufacturer, distributor, and wholesale supplier of Bulk Organic Plant Sterol Oil & Oil Powder. Phytosterols function as plant-derived cholesterol alternatives that support barrier function. Bulk orders available with organic options for natural and clean beauty formulations.
notes: Leading international supplement manufacturer with bulk wholesale capabilities. Organic options available for clean beauty formulations. Phytosterols mimic cholesterol's barrier-supporting properties while being plant-derived. Both oil and powder forms available for formulation flexibility.
